name.description: Plugin name. Should be the same as `metadata.name` of the corresponding `ConsolePlugin` resource used to represent the plugin on the cluster.

version.description: Plugin version. Must be semver compliant.

exposedModules.description: Specific modules exposed through the plugin's remote entry.

dependencies.description: Plugin API and other plugins required for this plugin to work. Values must be valid semver ranges or `*` representing any version.

disableStaticPlugins.description: Disable the given static plugins when this plugin gets loaded.
